name: Cat (ErenCatty)
description:
The cat wakes up and finds himself in a strange place, where he shall explore and figure out what happened to him.

A combination of Sokoban and word game. Beat the game by pushing letters to form meaningful words.

How to play？
  • Key Settings
    • W / S / A / D: Move
    • Esc: Call menu
    • Enter: Confirm
